task_description: Facing the building to your South-West (approx. 227°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the height of the building, I need to look up to see the top of the structure.
I need to adjust my heading to face the building directly and look up further to see the entire structure.
To see the top of the building, I need to look further up as the current pitch might not reveal the entire structure.
I need to adjust my heading back to 227° to face the building directly and ensure the pitch is high enough to see the top.
With the current pitch, I should be able to see the top of the building, allowing me to estimate its height.
